title: A Rick in the Wall
description: Unikingdom Film Festival debut and Silly-Billy McClown Times Award winner. Once a millenium comes a work that tells the story of all of us. Work. Life. Misery.
quote: Really makes you think. Doesn’t it?
altHero: Rick, a grey LEGO brick, floating in a dim kitchen
alt2: Unikitty statue spewing water onto Rick’s head
alt3: Rick as a baby in a stroller rolling down a flight of stairs
alt4: Rick pushing against a large stone object
